# WEAPON::SET_PED_CURRENT_WEAPON_VISIBLE

## Summary
Sets the visibility flag for the characters currently equipped weapon

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **BOOL** visibleFlag
* **BOOL** destroyObject = true
* **BOOL** deadCheck = true
* **BOOL** storeDestroyedWeaponClipValue = false:
Only used if "DestroyObject" is TRUE.
This flag ensures the weapon clip value if cached when destroyed, ensuring that it gets restored to this value when it is re-created.

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Has 5 parameters since latest patches.
